solution_line_template: The rate of the loan is 15%, which means Mike needs to give the bank an additional {loan_amount} * {loan_rate_numerator}/{loan_rate_denominator} = $<<{loan_amount}*{loan_rate_numerator}/{loan_rate_denominator}={additional_payment_to_bank}>>{additional_payment_to_bank}.
So the car will cost him {car_price} + {additional_payment_to_bank} = $<<{car_price}+{additional_payment_to_bank}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
